site-description: Move online and engage with your audience through social platforms

content.title: What do we do?
content.description:
In the era of the web and social media, small businesses struggle to keep on top and attract new customers. People typically go online to find the best price before they consider the high street.

Here at Digital Thunder we want to help you take the leap to online. We can supply beautifully designed websites, logos, and branding. Digital and physical advertising as well as social media marketing.

items.description: We can design and build the site you want, anywhere from small advertising platforms to blogs and portfolio sites
People access the web on devices of all shapes and sizes, your site needs to look great on all of them
Give your brand a refreshing lift with a modern logo and some attention grabbing marketing content

content.title: Web design
content.description:
We love building beautiful websites, which work seamlessly on devices of all shapes and sizes.

Wordpress is the content management system we use for those who need to regularly update their site. For most though, a static website to promote their products or services is a more suitable option.

Have an existing site that needs updating or a full redesign? We can help, just get in touch to get the ball rolling!

content.title: Graphics and logos
content.description:
We're passionate about design, the look and feel of your brand is a key factor in capturing your audience's attention.

Whether it's a major re-branding exercise or a simple graphic for your facebook page, you'll find our passion in all of our work.

content.title: Advertising
content.description: Posters, flyers and business cards simply must be sharp and sleek if you want to grab the readers attention! Get some help from our team designing and producing all of your physical and digital marketing content.

content.title: Bespoke design
content.description:
A variety of custom designs are available on request for a items such as; wedding invitations, advertising boards and signage, banners and party t-shirts.

Just send us through your ideas and we can make it happen.
